title: Honey and cumin roast carrots
time: Hands-on time 5 min, oven time 30 min
description: Honey-glazed carrots are a classic Sunday roast side dish, we’ve added cumin and za’tar to add a warm, spiced flavour.
ingredients: Few fresh thyme sprigs, leaves picked

method.Step 1: Heat the oven to 180°C/160°fan/gas 4. Put the carrots in a roasting tin and toss with the oil, cumin, mustard and maple syrup. Cover with foil and roast for 20 minutes.

method.Step 2: Uncover, stir and roast for 10-15 minutes to glaze and colour. Serve scattered with the thyme leaves and za’atar spice mix, if using.
